title: Shadowheart
content:
lasses may have the option to bypass the need for the rune. She will then offer to accompany you to the helm. Once you exit the Nautiloid, you will find her unconscious on the Ravaged Beach nearby. She will thank you for freeing her earlier, and offer to join your party.

However, if you visit the camp, trigger a fight, or find a waypoint before waking her, she will move on to the Druid Grove. She can be found sitting on a stone next to the Strange Ox.
